result.arabic_text: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ سَبۡعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٖ طِبَاقٗاۖ مَّا تَرَىٰ فِي خَلۡقِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مِن تَفَٰوُتٖۖ فَٱرۡجِعِ ٱلۡبَصَرَ هَلۡ تَرَىٰ مِن فُطُورٖ
result.translation: 3. Kan abuuray toddobo samooyin dabaqyo ah kala korreeya, ku arki meysid wax isdhaafsanaan ah abuurka (Ilaahay) Raxmaanka. Ee ku celi araggee: Miyaad ku aragtaa wax dillaac ah iyo duleello.
